title: Riot KateyKhaos best Riot Employee NA :3
body:
If you look at the red tracker she is all over it giving people a chance for their 100th win to face her and she 
has been doing this for so many people (She must have a really full schedule!). I honestly think that no rioter would do this much
for the fans. And for a fact she participates the most in the boards and the community so it just makes me happy that thier
is at least one rioter who still cares about the fans.

replies.body: At first I read that as Riot Kaceytron and I was like wat pls no

> At first I read that as Riot Kaceytron and I was like wat pls no

ROFL. Some of my friends call me Kateytron, so there's that. xD
Thats funny cause you aren't anything like her. You are actually Nice
Aww, thank you! :3

N080DY (NA)  - about 2 hours ago
what a nice lady c:

i wanna ask are you a male or female :/

> N080DY (NA)  - about 2 hours ago
> what a nice lady c:
> 
> i wanna ask are you a male or female :/

I'm a lady. :3
Never actually seen her in the fields of justice, over 1000 wins deep... One day though I shall see a riot person and be beaten into the ground.... again :P

> Never actually seen her in the fields of justice, over 1000 wins deep... One day though I shall see a riot person and be beaten into the ground.... again :P

I'm hiding in the bushes. :o

> > Never actually seen her in the fields of justice, over 1000 wins deep... One day though I shall see a riot person and be beaten into the ground.... again :P
> 
> I'm hiding in the bushes. :o

So....you're Garen? +_+

> > > Never actually seen her in the fields of justice, over 1000 wins deep... One day though I shall see a riot person and be beaten into the ground.... again :P
> > 
> > I'm hiding in the bushes. :o
> 
> So....you're Garen? +_+

I could be Teemo. :D
Best Rioter NA is Satan. We're all doomed XD

> Best Rioter NA is Satan. We're all doomed XD

ROFL.

I think it's awesome that she's able to hop in for 1000th win games.  This was something that started while the community was still small.  Being able to uphold that expectation for such a large population of players isn't easily viable anymore.  So, it's not fair to say that she's the only one that cares about everyone here.

> I think it's awesome that she's able to hop in for 1000th win games.  This was something that started while the community was still small.  Being able to uphold that expectation for such a large population of players isn't easily viable anymore.  So, it's not fair to say that she's the only one that cares about everyone here.

It's true! There's a lot of us who make an attempt to play with everyone! :D
We like Baconhawk a lot too...  The next course of action is obvious: you two must to fight to the death.  There can only be *one* favorite.
:D
For their 100th win?! I have at least 5x more than that, why did I not notice this >.<

> For their 100th win?! I have at least 5x more than that, why did I not notice this >.<

No. That's a typo. It's for their 1,000th win. lol One thousand
Oh xD I was about to say
what a nice lady c:
Can confirm. Best Rioter any A! :O
wait what?? You get to challenge a Riot employee when you get 100 wins?... I want in on this...
I've been playing since beta(late in the beta at that) and I've really only every played with one of their writers, Riot Paradox.
Katey rocks!
Do you even sleep, KK?

It's actually true!
I've been on a facebook group (League People) lately and there was a post there saying sion's W was bugged. And with my (FML) nerdy mathematical calculations, I've gotten the attention of her.

I might start to think that there is only one good RIOT employee...

;w; - Joost Zuijderduijn (
YAAAAAAAAASSSSSS MY GIRL KT BEST RIOTER NA
I don't think she works at Riot anymore, but I still remember Hollymonster being pretty awesome with helping me with the issue I had at the time.
If only I knew this earlier....

She's just amazing!
<3
never XD

I actually think that KateyKhaos is crazy, no reason, 
Just got that feeling from her omnipresence.
